name: Flappy Bird
overview: This is a Commodore 64 port of Flappy Bird Flappy Bird was a 2013 mobile game developed by Vietnamese artist and programmer Dong Nguyen, under his game development company dotGEARS. The game is a side-scroller where the player controls a bird, attempting to fly between rows of green pipes without hitting them. The developer created the game over several days, using a bird protagonist which he had designed for a cancelled game in 2012. Released as part of K&A plus #09 / part of "Single Button Games" collection.
